entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C

Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain or snow this evening then to snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
